description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url][url=https://legacy.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools/localization][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Help_Translate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=translate&color=ffbda3[/img][/url][url=https://github.com/Jodsderechte/DungeonAuraTools/releases/latest][img]https://badgen.net/github/release/Jodsderechte/DungeonAuraTools?style=flat-square[/img][/url]


I'm mainly a dps player so I might not realise if sth for Tank/Heal isn't working as it's supposed to if you find anything missing/buggy let me know!



This is still a big Work in Progress and Auras are being generated by [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools]My Addon[/URL] so head over there to be best prepared for The War Within. alternativly you can import them seperatly at the following urls:
[list]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons]https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons]https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons]https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons]https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons]https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons]https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons[/url]
[/list]



Currently has: 
[list]
[*] Tazavesh the veiled Market (Gambit and Streets)
[*] Plaguefall
[*] The Necrotic Wake
[*] De Other Side
[*] Mists of Tirna Scithe
[*] Theater of Pain
[*] Sanguine Depths
[*] Halls of Atonement
[*] Spires of Ascension
[/list]

Check out  [url=https://github.com/AcidWeb/Clean-Icons-Mechagnome-Edition]Clean Icons Mechagnome Edition[/url] if you want HD icon textures.
If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free.
If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1.
If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese]SharedMedia Causese[/url]
If you are using Causeses addon and do NOT want sounds select the group and go to Actions -> on Show and untick play sound


Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].
[s] Versioncheck [/s] Debuff/Interrupt idea  stolen from causese props to him

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]

I'm mainly a dps player so I might not realise if sth for Tank/Heal isn't working as it's supposed to if you find anything missing/buggy let me know! This is still a big Work in Progress and Auras are being generated by My Addon so head over there to be best prepared for The War Within. alternativly you can import them seperatly at the following urls:
  • https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons

  • https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons
Currently has:
  • Tazavesh the veiled Market (Gambit and Streets)
  • Plaguefall
  • The Necrotic Wake
  • De Other Side
  • Mists of Tirna Scithe
  • Theater of Pain
  • Sanguine Depths
  • Halls of Atonement
  • Spires of Ascension
Check out Clean Icons Mechagnome Edition if you want HD icon textures. If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free. If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1. If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: SharedMedia Causese If you are using Causeses addon and do NOT want sounds select the group and go to Actions -> on Show and untick play sound Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. Versioncheck Debuff/Interrupt idea stolen from causese props to him If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

comments.text: [taggeduser]@Onlyne[/taggeduser] i've thought about this multiple times but the limiting factor have always been affixes that are available in multiple dungeons. Since you can't nest dynamic groups you'd either have to choose a different position for them or include them in every single sub group so i've currently not changed anything but generally yes that would look neater in the option, doesn't change a whole lot outside of the very few people that use the options and for those people specifically i'm currently working on https://twitter.com/Jodsderechte/status/1562469776990949376/photo/1

I have been slowly organizing this WA pack (and the other dungeon ones) into groups like this.

https://imgur.com/a/5AYSlji

Thoughts?

[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] Thank you for the very quick response!  I only use WeakAuras App Companion, not the Wago APP.  I tried your solutions (except the ignore feature as I wanted to fix and continue to get updates of this fine WA of yours) but I was able to get it fixed through something else...

DISCOVERY:
It seems that there were still old Auras listed outside of the SL-Dungeons dynamic group that had v154 and v156 SL-Dungeon auras.  It's possible that this may have been updates that were not properly applied and duplicating when I would update to your latest version (your comment about duplicates).

FIX:
I deleted the SL-Dungeons Dynamic Group AND the separate SL-Dungeons auras that were not part of any dynamic group.  Then I reloaded my UI, then refreshed the WeakAura Companion App and then did another reload.

Next, I reinstalled the latest version SL-Dungeon (156 build) and all of the auras went into the appropriate dynamic group.  I did a reload/refresh/reload and there are no auras outside of their group and most importantly no update notifications.

SUPPLEMENTAL:
When I first started using WA, I went crazy with putting auras on and may have installed your current version AND a fork that someone else uploaded.  Over time these may have confused the updates.

- Thank you for your help and keep up the fine work.

[taggeduser]@rhodan[/taggeduser]
 What to do if WeakAuras keep showing Ready for Update auras
Check which of WeakAuras Companion and Wago App Companion addons are loaded, do not run both at the same time, refresh auras in app, and restart or type /reload in WoW.
Mouseover the yellow-ish Ready for Update buttons, tooltip show the list of auras it wants to update.
If you use duplicates of the same auras weakauras doesn't know which one to update.
Pick a solution:
- right click on ready-for-update buttons and click Update or Ignore updates
- find the aura (using Search field on top), go to Information tab, and delete Url field

[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] Shadowlands-Dungeons keeps telling me that an update is available even though I have the latest version (v1.1.26-156).  When I update the addon's auras the update notification remains.  I have tried create copy as well.  None of the other Season 4 Dungeon versions gives me this problem.  Help.
[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] Thanks for the reply. I've been using your WA all xpac so I was confused with the change. Much appreciated!!
[taggeduser]@darklego_tl[/taggeduser] [taggeduser]@Thömsen#2134[/taggeduser] Put up a quick youtube guide as i keep getting this question https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-m6bKgOGTgo
How do I set the group to grown down instead of right? Use to be able to do so, now the group tab is very different in the updated version from previous versions

[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] I selected nothing. This happens right after i import the WeakAura. Its maybe a Bug.
This did not happen to me with previous Imports of your WeakAuras.

So if you are running beta Dungeons and experience sth missing/a bug be sure to contact me and tell me whats wrong (more detailed than "In one of the dungeons there is an aura broken" would be appreciated if you want it to be fixed asap <3
